actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to limit the spread of nuclear technology without adequate guarantees of its peaceful use.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives strongly expresses its disapproval of the President's offer of nuclear technology to Egypt and other nations which do not at present have nuclear technology, without safeguards guaranteeing that this technology will not lead to the development of nuclear weapons. Provides that the House of Representatives will oppose any action by the President of the United States which would result in the spread of nuclear technology to Egypt and other nations which do not presently have such technology, by refusing to approve authorizations and appropriations for such undertakings, until the President can demonstrate to the satisfaction of the House of Representatives that there are adequate safeguards and controls limiting the use of such reactors and other forms of nuclear technology to peaceful uses.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to limit the spread of nuclear technology without adequate guarantees of its peaceful use.
